CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: CHI enters room and runs past camera view
<aft> CHI looks at table with boxes on it
CHI starts to open a box on table
<$=1> MOT shuts box CHI started to open then takes another box and carries it to the rug
MOT sits down on rug and sets box in front of her
CHI squats in front of box and starts to take its lid off
MOT shrugs her shoulders and lifts her hands up
CHI looks at book inside box
CHI opens book and looks at it then turns page
CHI sets book on the floor in front of MOT
MOT turn to first page and moves book closer to CHI
CHI points to picture on page
CHI points to picture on page then looks at MOT
CHI shakes head then looks at MOT
MOT nods head and looks at CHI then looks back at book
MOT points to picture on page
CHI looks at picture MOT is pointing to
CHI leans towards MOT nodding his head and looks at her
MOT looks at CHI and nods head
CHI points to picture on page
<$=1> MOT points to picture in book
MOT runs finger back and forth on picture
MOT points to different part of picture
CHI bumps page up and down with hand
CHI turns page then picks up book and sets it down in front of MOT again
MOT points to picture on page
<6-11> MOT points to picture on page
<1-3> CHI points at picture on page
CHI starts to point at page then pulls his hand back
MOT points to picture on page
CHI looks to where MOT pointed , looks at MOT , then looks at book
<bef> MOT starts to turn page then stops
CHI points to picture then pulls finger back
CHI points to picture on other page
<aft> CHI rolls away from book then stops facing book
<bef> CHI crawls back to book and kneels over it
MOT picks up book and looks at it closely then sets it back down
<aft> MOT looks at CHI with a confused expression
CHI lies down and rolls away from MOT and book
CHI rolls away from book again then faces book in crawling position . CHI rolls away from MOT and book
MOT points to picture on page
CHI crawls to book and looks at it
CHI points to picture in book
<$=1> CHI points to picture on page
<bef> CHI spins away from book then stops facing MOT and book
CHI spins more then stops facing book
CHI crawls back to the book then sits beside it
MOT points to picture in book
CHI continues to look at the book
CHI crawls around to front of book
<$=1> CHI lays in front of book and wiggles legs
MOT brushes her legs with hands
CHI is lying down and pushes self away from book
<aft> CHI crawls to MOT and sits by her looking at book
MOT sets book down between her and CHI
CHI crawls in front of book
CHI points to picture MOT is pointing at
<bef> CHI starts to push away from book then stops
CHI looks where MOT is pointing
MOT moves finger to different part of picture
MOT moves finger around on picture then takes finger away
CHI points to picture on page
CHI points to picture and taps it as he counts . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
MOT closes book and picks it up holding it facing CHI and points at picture on cover
CHI looks at box then at MOT
MOT puts book in box and carries it to table
MOT takes box from table and carries it to rug
<aft> CHI runs to center of rug
MOT sets box on rug then sits down
CHI takes box from MOT and starts to open it
CHI takes Cookie Monster puppet out of box and tosses it behind him then takes bird puppet out of box and holds it looking at it
MOT reaches for Cookie Monster puppet
CHI picks up Cookie Monster puppet before MOT does
CHI puts hand in puppet's mouth
CHI pulls hand out of puppet's mouth
MOT takes Cookie_Monster puppet from CHI
MOT puts Cookie_Monster puppet on CHIs arm
CHI moves close to MOT and holds onto her shirt with one hand
<aft> CHI grabs MOTs nose with puppet's mouth
CHI lets go of MOTs nose and leans backwards then drops puppet in box
MOT takes bird puppet out of box and puts it on her hand
CHI takes Cookie_Monster puppet out of box then crawls towards MOT
MOT makes puppet nibble on her hair then faces puppet towards CHI
CHI puts his nose in MOTs puppet's mouth
MOT makes puppet bite CHIs nose
CHI turns away from MOT and puppet
CHI looks at MOT then back at Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI puts on Cookie_Monster puppet and touches puppets' mouths together then pulls Cookie_Monster puppet away
CHI moves Cookie_Monster puppet close to bird puppet on MOTs hand
CHI watches puppet on MOTs hand
CHI puts face close to puppet on MOTs hand
CHI kisses puppet on MOTs hand
CHI looks at Cookie_Monster puppet on his hand
CHI kisses bird puppet on MOTs hand
CHI pulls back from puppet and holds arms open wide
CHI looks at MOT then back at bird puppet
CHI moves Cookie_Monster puppet on his arm to MOTs face
CHI glances at puppet then looks back at MOT
<bef> CHI drops puppet off his hand . CHI takes puppet off MOTs hand
CHI puts bird puppet on his hand
<bef> CHI covers MOTs nose with puppets mouth
CHI takes puppet away from MOT and sits back
CHI drops bird puppet off hand and starts to put Cookie_Monster on hand
MOT reaches over to help CHI put puppet on hand
MOT moves hand to help CHI put puppet on then withdraws hand
CHI tries to slide hand into bird puppet
MOT helps CHI pull hand into bird puppet
MOT slides puppet onto CHIs hand
CHI turns bird puppet facing him
CHI reaches for MOT with both puppets and falls on her
CHI leans against MOT then flings puppets off arms and rolls away from MOT
<bef> CHI picks up lid to box then gets up and starts to throw box at MOT
MOT puts arms out to protect herself
CHI drops box lid and falls on the floor
MOT picks up bird puppet and puts it on her hand
CHI bends down and grabs Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI picks up puppet and tries to open it to put it on his hand
CHI tries to open puppet again
CHI turns puppet face up and looks at it
MOT holds bird puppet up in front of CHI and moves its mouth
CHI looks at bird puppet then back at Cookie_Monster puppet on his hand
CHI glances at bird puppet then at Cookie_Monster puppet and finally at MOT
CHI takes a couple steps back from MOT
CHI stands looking at Cookie_Monster puppet on his hand
CHI looks at puppet and smiles
CHI looks at bird puppet on MOTs hand
CHI walks to MOT and touches the mouth of his puppet her puppet
CHI pushes his puppet's mouth against the others then backs away
CHI looks at bird puppet on MOTs hand
CHI walks to MOT and takes hold of her puppet then looks into its mouth
CHI lets go of bird puppet and backs away swinging arms
MOT moves puppets mouth and head
CHI walks over to puppet on MOTs hand and opens its mouth and looks inside then lets go of puppet
CHI boxes and moves towards MOT then punches puppet on her hand with his puppet
CHI tackles MOTs arm and puppet and wrestles it to the floor
MOT pulls hand away from CHI
CHI lays on floor then drops his head on his arms
MOT moves puppet close to CHIs face and moves its mouth then pulls puppet away
MOT puts puppet close to CHIs face again and moves its mouth then pulls puppet away
CHI moves elbow to push MOT away
MOT moves puppet close to CHI again and makes it speak
CHI continues to lay on floor not moving
CHI raises head and looks at MOT
CHI grabs Cookie_Monster puppet and tosses it to MOT . CHI grabs bird puppet on MOTs hand and tries to pull it off
CHI pulls puppet off MOTs hand
CHI puts bird puppet on his hand
<bef> MOT puts hand in Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI looks at puppet on MOTs hand then glances at puppet on his hand then back at MOTs puppet
<aft> CHI attacks MOTs puppet with his own
CHI continues to attack MOTs puppet with his own
looks at puppet on MOTs hand
CHI flings puppet off his hand and spins away from MOT
CHI stops and sits looking at MOT
CHI flops onto floor and lies face down
MOT makes Cookie_Monster puppet on her hand bite CHIs leg
MOT makes puppet bite CHIs leg again
CHI moves farther away from MOT
MOT takes puppet off her hand and puts it in box
CHI watches what MOT does with puppet
MOT points to puppet on floor
CHI stands up and walks towards puppet . <aft> CHI puts puppet in box
<bef> CHI runs to box top then brings it to MOT
CHI hands box top to MOT
CHI starts to walk towards desk
CHI turns back towards MOT then squats and helps her put the lid on the box
CHI stands up and starts to walk towards desk
MOT gets up and carries box to desk
CHI runs back to center of rug
MOT walks to CHI carrying box
MOT sets box on rug then sits down
<1> CHI sets lid of box aside . <aft> grabs crayon
CHI takes paper out of box and sets it on rug
CHI tries to pick up piece of lint on paper
CHI tries to pick up lint on paper
CHI tries to pick up lint from paper
CHI picks up lint off paper and puts it in box then repeats the action
CHI holds up crayon for MOT to see then sets it beside him
CHI holds up another crayon then sets it beside him also
CHI holds up another crayon for MOT to see
<bef> CHI looks at crayons in his hand
CHI holds a crayon out to MOT
CHI sits back down on other side of paper
CHI takes crayon and starts to draw on paper
CHI picks up another crayon and starts to draw with it
CHI stops drawing and puts down crayon and picks up a different color
MOT holds crayon out to CHI
CHI draws a little with crayon then puts it down and picks up another crayon and draws with it then puts that crayon down and picks up another and draws then stops
CHI reaches hand out towards MOT then looks back at crayons
CHI holds up crayon towards MOT
CHI looks at crayon he just held up
<bef> CHI holds up crayon in other hand
CHI waves crayon then drops it
CHI picks up a crayon he had dropped and holds it up
CHI picks up another crayon and holds it up briefly
<bef> CHI picks up another crayon then stands up
CHI holds crayon out to MOT
CHI draws on paper with crayon
CHI holds crayon out to MOT
MOT starts to draw on paper
CHI sits back and watches MOT
CHI leans forwards and points to paper with crayon
MOT stops drawing and sits back watching CHI
CHI stops drawing and turns away from paper then turns back and puts crayon to paper and colors
CHI stops drawing and looks at MOT
CHI looks at MOT then back at paper
<aft> CHI starts to scribble on paper
CHI sets crayon down and picks up piece of paper
CHI starts to get up and shows picture to MOT
MOT takes picture from CHI and looks at it
CHI picks up other piece of paper and looks at it then sets it back on rug
CHI looks at MOT then around at crayons
MOT points to picture with crayon
<aft> CHI looks at picture MOT is pointing at then down at paper
<bef> CHI starts to draw on paper
MOT is not visible on camera
CHI draws then puts down crayon and continues drawing with another crayon
<bef> CHI stops drawing and hands paper to MOT
MOT holds paper in hands looking at it
CHI turns and starts to walk away from MOT
CHI turns and starts to walk back to MOT
CHI runs over to MOT and sits down facing her
MOT points to picture with crayon
CHI grabs paper MOT is holding and sets it on rug
CHI stands up and swings arm holding crayons
CHI stands and swings arms with crayons in hand
CHI plays with crayons in his hands
MOT glances at CHI then back at paper
CHI plays with crayons in his hands and watches MOT then starts to back away from MOT
CHI walks back to paper and squats down and colors
CHI continues to draw on paper then sits down and sets crayon aside and picks up another one
CHI taps crayon on paper then looks for another crayon
MOT points to picture with crayon
CHI picks up paper and hands it to MOT then stands up
CHI walks towards desk then turns and looks at MOT
MOT puts paper back in box
CHI walks to box and drops crayons in
CHI starts to walk back towards desk
CHI turns and looks at MOT
<bef> CHI runs to box top and kneels leaning into it examining it closely
CHI looks at MOT then back at box top
CHI puts box top on his head
CHI stands in front of MOT with box on his head
MOT reaches for box top and smiles
MOT takes box top from CHI then puts it on box
End of Crayons and Paper Activity
MOT stands up and carries box to table
CHI stands by desk watching MOT
MOT picks up box and carries it to rug
MOT helps CHI open flaps of box
CHI pulls house out of box
CHI feels outside of house with hand
MOT unsnaps house so it opens
CHI looks at other side of house and knocks object out of house
CHI looks at front of house and opens and shuts door
MOT scoots house closer to herself
MOT opens house and looks inside
CHI lets go of door and looks inside house
CHI takes object from inside house and moves it around to front of house
CHI moves object closer to door in front of house
CHI takes object out of house
CHI moves object to front of house
CHI sits up and looks in house
CHI pushes house shut then examines the garage
CHI reaches inside garage and pulls out a car
MOT opens up house and leans closer watching CHI
<bef> CHI pushes house so back of garage is near him
CHI looks at back of garage
CHI moves close to house and leans on it
CHI takes toy person out of house and lays it on rug
CHI reaches into house then lays more toy people on rug
CHI plays with people on rug
CHI puts one of the toy people back in house
CHI takes play table out of house
<1-4> CHI sets table down on rug near people . CHI moves car slightly
CHI reaches for other toy person then sits up and examines roof of house
CHI shuts house more then picks up car
CHI picks up other toy person
CHI puts second person in car also
CHI sets car on rug by house
CHI tries to push car through back wall of garage
CHI pushes car against garage wall again
CHI moves car to front of garage
CHI starts to put car in garage
CHI takes toy person out of car and puts it on rug
CHI takes other person out of car
CHI picks up toy people from rug
CHI opens house and puts toy people inside
CHI puts another object back in house
<bef> CHI puts a toy person in house
CHI puts another object in house
CHI pushes car into garage then looks into garage
CHI shuts garage door and sits up
CHI looks at box house came in
CHI plays with handle on house
CHI takes object out of house and looks at it
<aft> CHI reaches into other side of house and takes out chairs
CHI taps chairs together then sets them on rug
CHI looks at MOT then at table on rug
CHI sets chair next to table
CHI moves to place second chair
CHI sets other chair by table opposite first chair
<bef> CHI takes something out of house and puts in on one of the chair
CHI rummages in house with hand
CHI continues to rummage in house
CHI takes bed out of house and sets it on rug and puts a toy person on it
CHI sits up and looks back in house
CHI reaches into house and pulls out another object
CHI sets another bed with a doll on it on the rug
